name: What Can I Get You?
description:
What Can I Get You? is a collaborative anthology game about food and our various relationships to food. Created and developed by Jonathan Levstein and Kaitlin Tremblay, it is a way to explore the different ways people approach food and the different ways it can affect our lives.

Contributors include: Mic Fok, Vicky He, Kate Kadowaki, Lisa Levstein, Sloane Cee, Jillian Wakarchuk, Emma Fissenden, Chris Chung, Jonathan Levstein, and Kaitlin Tremblay
